FrontEnd

Class WindowLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • FrontEnd.WindowLoader

  • public class WindowLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to load new windows.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static javafx.stage.Stage w 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WindowLoader(javafx.scene.Node window)
      Creates a window loader that changes the scene shown to the user.
      WindowLoader(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Creates a new window loader that can change the current scene in this window

      • WindowLoader

        public WindowLoader(javafx.scene.Node window)
        Creates a window loader that changes the scene shown to the user.
        Parameters:
        window - any Node object on the stage that you wish control.

      • WindowLoader

        public WindowLoader(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        Creates a new window loader that can change the current scene in this window
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - primary stage as reference to which window to change

      • load

        public void load(java.lang.String window,
                 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> initData)
        swaps the scene for the given scene. Window should be the scene file name i.e. to swap to MenuScreen.fxml use "MenuScreen"
        Parameters:
        window - scene name
        initData - state of application

      • loadCustomLE

        public void loadCustomLE(java.lang.String window,
                         java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> initData,
                         Slot[][] slots,
                         java.lang.String[] startLocationX,
                         java.lang.String[] startLocationY)
        This class is very similar to the one above but is used specifically for loading a game as there are some methods Inside of the LEMainController class that need to be called for everything to work properly
        Parameters:
        window - scene name
        initData - The HashMap of data that gets transferred across Windows
        slots -
        startLocationX -
        startLocationY -
